text: int sum_of_tri ( int * , int , int , int , int * ) ; int main ( ) { int t , n , x , y ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int tri [ n ] [ n ] ; for ( x = 0 ; x < n ; x ++ ) for ( y = 0 ; y <= x ; y ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & tri [ x ] [ y ] ) ; for ( x = n - 2 ; x >= 0 ; x -- ) for ( y = x ; y >= 0 ; y -- ) tri [ x ] [ y ] += ( tri [ x + 1 ] [ y + 1 ] > tri [ x + 1 ] [ y ] ) ? tri [ x + 1 ] [ y + 1 ] : tri [ x + 1 ] [ y ] ; printf ( "%d\n" , tri [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
